Description: Model box, made of wood and painted blue, red, green and black, solid, rectangular, pitched lid with four posts on which are four Ba-birds, in the centre is a dog, and four holes for tenons.
Bibliographic references: Stuttgart 2007 / Ägyptische Mumien : Unsterblichkeit im Land der Pharaonen (no. 212)
Exhibition history: 1990-2003, Frankfurt, Naturmuseum Senckenberg, long term loan 2007-2008 6 Oct-24 Mar, Stuttgart, Württemberg State Museum, Agyptische Mumien: Botschafter aus dem Land der Pharaonen 2021-2022 9 Oct - 10 Jan, Tokyo, Museum of Science and Nature, Mummies of Ancient Egypt: rediscovering six lives (Egyptian Mummies 2) 2022 5 Feb- 8 May, Kobe City Museum, Mummies of Ancient Egypt: rediscovering six lives (Egyptian Mummies 2) 2022 14 Jul - 26 Oct, Madrid, CaixaForum, Mummies of Ancient Egypt: rediscovering six lives (Egyptian Mummies 2) 2022-2023 1 Dec – 19 Mar, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Mummies of Ancient Egypt: rediscovering six lives (Egyptian Mummies 2) 2023 25 Apr - 2 Sep, Seville, CaixaForum, Mummies of Ancient Egypt: rediscovering six lives (Egyptian Mummies 2) 2023-2024 4 Oct – 28 Jan, Valencia, CaixaForum, Mummies of Ancient Egypt: rediscovering six lives (Egyptian Mummies 2)
